original_text:
Cash Eruption
Nelle profondità di un tempio azteco, la slot machine Cash Eruption aspetta di far saltare in aria i premi dalle bobine al vostro bankroll. I tradizionali simboli a tema frutta appaiono accanto a una bellissima Dea del Fuoco e a palle di fuoco che lanciano un bonus round di respins.
Durante questa funzione della slot Cash Eruption online, potrete scoprire uno qualsiasi dei quattro jackpot, incluso il premio Grand Treasure. Tra le altre caratteristiche di rosso fuoco ci sono l’espansione dei simboli wild e un giro gratis con simboli di dimensioni gigantesche che riempiono le bobine centrali.
Le vincite di questo fantastico gioco di IGT possono raggiungere 1.000x la tua scommessa totale.
Un po’ di tema misto vi aspetta in Cash Eruption, una slot machine che si basa su vulcani in eruzione per portare le vittorie davvero preziose, ma per il resto si attiene a un tema classico che ci è molto familiare. È una delle slot IGT per il 2020, un gioco con una buona grafica e un paio di caratteristiche che dovrebbero rendere il tutto interessante.
Una grafica esplosiva
Cash Eruption offre bobine 5×3 con 20 linee, circa il tipo di layout più comune che si possa pensare. La slot offre vittorie di pattern che possono portare jackpot fino a 1.000x la posta in gioco, ma anche Scatter, giri gratis, simboli jumbo collegati, espansione wilds e un Cash Eruption Bonus. Un RTP fino al 96% è possibile, anche se, poiché lo sviluppatore permette ai casinò online alimentati da IGT di scegliere all’interno di un intervallo, può anche essere fino al 93,10%.
Si tratta di un insolito mix di simboli di frutta standard e di immagini esotiche ad alto rendimento. Le ciliegie, i cocomeri e i limoni condividono lo spazio con i tradizionali simboli a campana e i 7 rossi. La sorprendente dea del fuoco è un’immagine dettagliata di una donna azteca con un top da bikini e una corona d’oro.
Tutto è ambientato all’interno di un tempio di pietra, dove il bagliore di un’eruzione vulcanica si riflette sulle pareti. Una melodia vivace gioca d’accordo, e anche se è molto orecchiabile, non siamo sicuri che si adatti completamente allo stile di una slot machine a tema azteco.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Tuttavia, non appena si inizia a giocare alla slot Cash Eruption online, ci si dimentica di qualsiasi scontro di stili. È un gioco facile e interessante del popolare sviluppatore di IGT, con alcuni bonus entusiasmanti e un eccellente potenziale di vincita.
Potrebbe iniziare con il tema dell’eruzione di un vulcano, uno in cui la regina della giungla è la selvaggia, le palle di fuoco sono usate come spargimenti, e i vulcani come inneschi per le rotazioni libere, ma alla fine si finisce comunque con un classico tema di frutta.
Anche se non paga direttamente i premi, la Dea del fuoco è un simbolo selvaggio che agisce come gli altri, se necessario, per completare le linee vincenti. Se è in grado di creare una vincita, la Dea del Fuoco diventa un simbolo wild in espansione che riempie intere bobine in una volta sola.
Atterrate i simboli rossi del numero 7 e la Dea del Fuoco in tutte e 15 le posizioni dei simboli della slot online Cash Eruption per vincere un premio bonus di 1000x la vostra puntata totale.
Ogni tre, quattro o cinque simboli di spargimento del vulcano pagano 2x, 15x, o 100x la tua scommessa totale prima di lanciare sei giri gratis. In ogni gioco bonus, le tre bobine centrali si riempiono con un simbolo casuale di super-size. Atterrare lo stesso simbolo su una bobina per quattro vittorie garantite di un genere, o sulla bobina di destra allo stesso tempo per una linea completa.
Una diversa tabella di linee di pagamento si applica durante tutto il round, quindi si può vincere più spesso, ma a parte i 7, le vincite massime sono ridotte.
La slot machine Cash Eruption ha un turno di bonus respins. Vedrete i simboli delle palle di fuoco, ognuno con un valore in contanti in qualsiasi giro. Se sei o più terreni in una sola volta, si bloccano per un iniziale tre respins dei rulli. Ogni altra palla di fuoco in un respin riporta il contatore a tre e si blocca anche sui rulli.
Questo continua fino a quando non rimangono più respin, o tutte e 15 le posizioni si riempiono di palle di fuoco, dopo di che si rivendicano tutti i valori combinati in vista. Simboli terrestri con i jackpot Mini, Minor o Major su di essi per vincere il premio corrispondente. Questi sono piccoli jackpot, del valore di 5x, 25x, e 100x la tua puntata, quindi il premio Grand Treasure è quello che vuoi.
Riempi tutti i 15 posti della slot online Cash Eruption con palle di fuoco, e vinci tutti i valori combinati più il jackpot fisso Grand Treasure di 10.000,00€.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Simboli di fuoco utili come icone Wild piovono sui rulli della slot Volcano Eruption Extreme di NextGen Gaming. È un gioco a cinque rulli, 25 linee, dove un vulcano esplode in vita, aggiungendo i simboli selvaggi in una delle varie caratteristiche. Altri bonus includono respins con i wilds bloccati sul rullo centrale.
Si può vincere un enorme jackpot progressivo quando si gioca alla slot Jackpot Giant di Playtech. Un gigante dei cartoni animati supervisiona l’azione su cinque rulli e 50 linee di pagamento. Viene fornito con un giro di picchettaggio a vulcano, e se atterri cinque wilds sulla prima linea, ti aggiudichi il premio progressivo.

raw_translation.response:
Cash Eruption

In the depths of an Aztec temple, the slot machine Cash Eruption awaits to explode the prizes from the reels into your bankroll. Traditional fruit-themed symbols appear alongside a beautiful Fire Goddess and fireballs that launch a respins bonus round.

During this feature of the online Cash Eruption slot, you can uncover any of the four jackpots, including the Grand Treasure prize. Among the other red-hot features are the expansion of wild symbols and a free spin with giant symbols that fill the central reels.

The winnings of this fantastic IGT game can reach up to 1,000x your total bet. Cash Eruption offers 5x3 reels with 20 paylines, and the game has a good graphics with a couple of features that should make everything interesting for experienced players.

An explosive graphic, the slot features a mix of standard fruit symbols and exotic high-yielding images set within a stone temple, where the glow of a volcanic eruption reflects on the walls. A lively melody plays in the background, although it may not entirely fit the Aztec theme.

During the game, you land on standard fruit symbols, including cherries, watermelons, and lemons alongside traditional bell symbols and red 7s. The flamboyant Fire Goddess is the only Wild symbol that acts as others when necessary. If it creates a winning line, she becomes an expanding wild symbol, filling the entire reel at once.

To win a 1000x total bet bonus prize, land on all 15 symbol positions of the online Cash Eruption slot's 7 red and Fire Goddess symbol. Three, four or five volcano scatter symbols pay 2x, 15x, or 100x the total stake before launching six free spins.

With each bonus game, the three center reels fill up with a random super-sized symbol. Landing the same symbol on a reel brings about four guaranteed wins of a kind or a complete line with the right-side reel.

The Cash Eruption slot machine has a respins bonus round in which you see the fireball symbols, each with a cash value in any spin. If you land on six or more in a single turn, they lock for an initial three respins of the reels. Any other fireball during a respin restores the counter to three and locks on the reels too.

This continues until there are no more respins left, or all the 15 positions filled with fireballs, after which you claim all the combined view values. The land-based jackpots Mini, Minor or Major symbols land to win the corresponding prizes of 5x, 25x, and 100x your bet value, making the Grand Treasure the ultimate prize.

In conclusion, the Cash Eruption slot machine is an easy and exciting game from IGT developer, with a few exhilarating bonuses and an excellent winning potential suitable for experienced gamblers.

raw_translation.response:
Cash Eruption

Deep within an Aztec temple lies the Cash Eruption slot machine, waiting to explode with prizes and fill your bankroll with riches. Traditional fruit-themed symbols appear alongside a beautiful Fire Goddess and fireballs that trigger a respins bonus round.

During this feature in the Online Cash Eruption slot, you can uncover any of the four jackpots, including the Grand Treasure prize. Other fiery features include expanding wild symbols and a free spin with giant symbols that fill the central reels.

The wins in this fantastic IGT slot game can reach up to 1,000x your total bet.

A mix of standard fruit symbols and exotic high-yield imagery awaits you in Cash Eruption, a slot machine based on erupting volcanoes to bring truly precious wins but otherwise sticking to a classic theme that we are all familiar with. It is one of IGT's slots for 2020, featuring good graphics and a couple of features that should make it interesting.

Explosive Graphics

Cash Eruption offers 5x3 reels with 20 lines, roughly the most common layout you can think of. The slot offers pattern wins that can bring jackpots up to 1,000x the wager, as well as scatters, free spins, linked jumbo symbols, expanding wilds, and a Cash Eruption Bonus. A 96% RTP is possible, though since the developer allows IGT-powered online casinos to choose within a range, it can also be up to 93.10%.

It's an unusual mix of standard fruit symbols and exotic high-yield imagery. Cherries, watermelons, and lemons share space with traditional bell symbols and red 7s. The stunning fire goddess is a detailed image of an Aztec woman wearing a bikini top and a golden crown.

Everything is set inside a stone temple, where the glow of a volcanic eruption is reflected on the walls. A lively melody plays along, and although it is very catchy, we're not sure it completely fits the style of an Aztec-themed slot machine.

Slot Machine Features and Symbols

However, as soon as you start playing the Online Cash Eruption slot, you forget about any style clash. It's an easy and exciting game from popular IGT developer, with some exciting bonuses and excellent winning potential.

It might start with a volcano eruption theme, one in which the jungle queen is the wild, fireballs are used as scatters, and volcanoes act as triggers for free spins, but in the end, you still end up with a classic fruit theme.

Although it doesn't directly pay prizes, the Fire Goddess is a wild symbol that acts like any other, stepping in when needed to complete winning lines. If it can create a win, the Fire Goddess becomes an expanding wild symbol that fills entire reels at once.

Land red number 7 symbols and the Fire Goddess in all 15 positions of the Cash Eruption online slot symbols to win a 1000x total bet bonus prize.

Every three, four, or five volcano scatter symbols pay out 2x, 15x, or 100x your total bet before launching six free spins. In every bonus game, the three middle reels are filled with a random super-sized symbol. Land the same symbol on one reel for four guaranteed wins of a kind, or on the rightmost reel at the same time for a full line.

A different paytable applies throughout the round, so you can win more often, but aside from the 7s, the maximum wins are reduced.

The Cash Eruption slot machine has a respins bonus round. You'll see fireball symbols, each with a cash value on any spin. If six or more land at once, they lock in place for an initial three reel respins. Every other fireball in a respin resets the counter to three and also locks in on the reels.

This continues until there are no more respins left, or all 15 positions are filled with fireballs, after which you claim all the combined values in sight. Land fireball symbols with Mini, Minor, or Major jackpots on them to win the corresponding prize. These are small jackpots, worth 5x, 25x, and 100x your bet, so the Grand Treasure prize is what you want.

Fill all 15 spots of the Online Cash Eruption slot with fireballs, and win all the combined values plus the fixed Grand Treasure jackpot of €10,000.

Similar Slot Machines

Useful fire symbols as wild icons rain down on the reels of NextGen Gaming's Volcano Eruption Extreme slot. It's a five-reel, 25-line game where a volcano comes to life, adding wild symbols in one of the various features. Other bonuses include respins with wilds locked on the central reel.

You can win a huge progressive jackpot when playing Playtech's Jackpot Giant slot. A cartoon giant oversees the action on five reels and 50 paylines. It comes with a pick-a-volcano spin, and if you land five wilds on the first line, you win the progressive prize.

Cash Eruption has four jackpots, including the Grand Treasure prize worth €10,000. You can win smaller jackpots - Mini, Minor, and Major - by landing fireball symbols with those jackpot prizes in the Cash Eruption Bonus round. Fill all 15 positions with fireballs to win all the combined values and the Grand Treasure prize.

Bonus rounds

Cash Eruption has two bonus rounds: a Cash Eruption Bonus and a free spins round. In the Cash Eruption Bonus, you can win any of four jackpots, including the Grand Treasure prize, by landing fireball symbols. Six or more fireball symbols trigger a respins feature that locks symbols in place for three respins. Every other symbol that lands locks in place too, and you win all the cash values in sight when you run out of respins or fill all 15 spots with fireballs. In the free spins round, every spin has a super-sized symbol on the central reels for more guaranteed wins.

Free spin round

When three or more volcano scatter symbols land on the reels, you trigger the free spins round in Cash Eruption. You get six free spins, and during every spin, a super-sized symbol appears on the central reels. Land the same symbol on one of the three central reels for four guaranteed wins of that symbol in a row. Land the same symbol on the rightmost reel too, and you get a full line of wins. A different paytable applies during free spins for more frequent wins.

Expanding wild symbols

The Fire Goddess is a wild symbol in Cash Eruption that substitutes for any symbol except for the volcano scatter and fireball symbols. When the Fire Goddess can complete a winning line, she expands to fill the entire reel. This can lead to more wins in a single spin.

Maximum win potential

Cash Eruption has a maximum win potential of up to 1,000x your total bet. You can win this prize by landing the Fire Goddess in all 15 positions and the red number 7 symbol on the reels. In the Cash Eruption Bonus round, you can win up to 100x your total bet from the Mini, Minor, and Major jackpots, or the Grand Treasure prize worth €10,000. Fill all 15 positions with fireball symbols to win all the combined values plus the Grand Treasure jackpot.

Theme and graphics

Cash Eruption is an Aztec-themed slot machine game featuring a mix of standard fruit symbols and exotic high-yield imagery. The game is set inside an Aztec temple, where the glow of a volcanic eruption is reflected on the walls. The fire goddess symbol is a detailed image of an Aztec woman wearing a golden crown. The graphics are good, and the catchy melody adds to the excitement of the game.
